description: Discharge of planning obligation Schedule 7, Paragraph 1-3 Public Realm specification (external Lighting and Security) for planning permission 16/AP/3144 Redevelopment of the site for a mixed use development comprising a basement/mezzanine basement, ground plus twenty-three floors to accommodate a 140 room hotel (levels 1-11), 48 residential units (levels 12-24), a retail unit (at ground floor), associated cycle parking, servicing and refuse and recycling, landscaping and private and communal residential amenity space (including at roof top level), external refurbishment to the front of the railway arches, and a new pedestrian route through the site linking Newington Causeway with Tiverton Street
